Class IEmailTemplateSource

  • gw.plugin.email.IEmailTemplateSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IEmailTemplateSource
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Interface description...

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale, String strTemplateFilename)

    • Method Detail

      • getEmailTemplate

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale,
                                        String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the email template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to generate the email for
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

      • getEmailTemplate

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the email template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

      • getEmailTemplates

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(String strTopic,
                                           String[] keywords)
        Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        strTopic - The email topic. If null, returns templates w/o regard to topic.
        keywords - An array of keywords for selective searching.
        Returns:
        An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.

      • getEmailTemplates

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale,
                                           Map<K,V> valuesToMatch)
        Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to generate the email for
        valuesToMatch - An map of name values to match
        Returns:
        An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.
